text: The @EnvAgency has set up an interactive website (expires in mid March 2021) so locals and EA project team can discuss  proposals for updating the Lower Mole flood alleviation scheme. Pls join and share your views.  https://t.co/sNrPpbhyQN

3 years ago an oil slick polluted the River Lea. 
It exposed the lack of information given to people, putting them & the environment at greater risk.
So it was brilliant @EnvAgencySE set up alerts for serious incidents across North London.
It seems the service will end in March. https://t.co/zjb9gVFLUw

urls.title: Guest post: How global warming is making power plants produce less electricity | Carbon Brief
urls.description: The coal, gas and nuclear power plants that generate most of the world‚Äôs electricity have to be kept cool in order to function properly. However, this will be increasingly challenging as the world gets warmer.

text:
"In thermal power plants, just 30-50% of the energy stored in the coal, gas or nuclear fuel is used to generate electricity. The rest of the energy is dissipated as heat ‚Äì & lots of it"
#SayNo2SizewellC @KwasiKwarteng @annietrev  @beisgovuk @EnvAgency 
https://t.co/AQjVDjv0gh
